comments.body: I faced the same problem. 500 error appears when a message is big. If shorten it then it will be posted. comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Through out today I have been receiving calls from users asking about strange behavior of the website. And I cool them down that the website will be ok. And this whole issue of the website behaviour started since yesterday evening. But my message was not 500 error but verification page. It was written "checking if the site connection is secure". And the page was restarting again and again, so I could not post. And from the beginning I know that the issue is from forum and not from my side. I thank God that it is working now. It's like some people are still facing it now.
